code: import React from"react";import ProjectComponent from"../components/ProjectComponent";import LIFE from"../assets/LIFE.pdf";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FinishedProjects(props){var links1=[["http://acm.engr.scu.edu/inrix/","INRIX Hackathon"],["https://devpost.com/software/publix-transportation","Devpost Submission"],["https://github.com/danielmccannsayles/INRIX_HACKATHON_REAL","Github Publix Website"]];var links2=[["SECONDCHANCES","Final Presentation"],["THIRDPLACE","Certificate"]];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"white"},className:"md:p-4 md:mb-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"font-bold pt-4 mb-8 text-xl section-header text-center",id:"FinishedProjects",children:"Finished Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" flex flex-wrap items-center justify-center lg:w-11/12 mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectComponent,{specialid:"1",title:"Inrix Hackathon",text:"I attended a hackathon in November 2021 through SCU, sponsored by INRIX[1]. Our project was a website built in react.js that compares public transportation cost and private transportation cost, leveraging INRIX\u2019s data and making heavy use of Google & INRIX\u2019s APIs. I worked mostly with the front end design of the website, and the google API\u2019s, including an inserted customizable google map iframe that drew a user-inputted route onto it. I worked with a client, James Binnall, and his soon-to-be non-profit \u2018California System-Involved Bar Association\u2019 (CSIBA). I was the only person working on this project, so I had to simultaneously communicate with my client, manage my time, and summarize/present. The tasks I accomplished: Fixing the website aesthetics, including making it mobile friendly through CSS media queries; adding a FAQ and more content to the website; and creating an automated email campaign. You can view the presentation[1] that I gave to the judges, and you can also view the certificate I got for placing in third[2].",links:links2}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"my-4"})," "]})]});}export default FinishedProjects;
